text:
this strikes me as a good use case for sciml

<https://cdorgs.github.io/>

elements.text: this strikes me as a good use case for sciml

text: Broadly related is the area of synthetic biology; I've (hopefully - subject to funding...) got a PhD student starting to try some sciml ideas there. If anyone is working on related topics, it'd be good to hear from you.
